body:
Hi, my name is Alex. I have been playing on Avicus for over a year now but I have never been active on forums before. I thought this post would be a good way to introduce myself and I plan to get more involved in these discussions. 

Also, a slightly unrelated question but what has happened to the MC ZONE map rotations because I have not seen any since the big changes to Avicus this week?
body_tagged:

title: Hello

replies.body: The 3 McZone rots are in the 'Legacy' area.
replies.body_tagged: The 3 McZone rots are in the 'Legacy' area.

replies.body: Thanks a lot Blizzem I was scared they were gone!
replies.body_tagged: Thanks a lot Blizzem I was scared they were gone!

replies.body:
Heyo!! Welcome back to the server man! Make sure that you check out plug.dj for some cool parties and that you read the rules again if you have forgot them! If you need any help please contact one of the staff members if you need help!

Thanks! :]

Hey there fellow Avicadian! Great to see you on the forums :)

If you have any questions, concerns or suggestions, feel free to ask me or any other staff member about them!

Enjoy your stay :3
